value.excerpt: DeepMind researchers argue that anticolonial theory should be part of the AI development process to avoid perpetuating algorithmic oppression.

value.title: Reducing bias in AI-based financial services

value.title: Deepfakes Are Becoming the Hot New Corporate Training Tool
value.excerpt: Coronavirus restrictions make it harder and more expensive to shoot videos. So some companies are turning to synthetic media instead.

value.title: Don’t ask if artificial intelligence is good or fair, ask how it shifts power
value.excerpt: Law enforcement, marketers, hospitals and other bodies apply artificial intelligence (AI) to decide on matters such as who is profiled as a criminal, who is likely to buy what product at what price, who gets medical treatment and who gets hired.

value.title: AI Behaving Badly: New Model Could Help AI Make More Ethical Choices
value.excerpt: AI often makes decisions with little human input, and it's hard to predict the circumstances under which they're likely to choose an unethical approach.
